scriptmanager.scripts.Sequence_Analysis

Class DNAShapefromBED

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Sequence_Analysis.DNAShapefromBED

  • public class DNAShapefromBED
extends java.lang.Object
    This script calculates various aspects of DNA shape across a set of BED intervals.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    DNAShapeReference, DNAShapefromBEDCLI, DNAShapefromBEDOutput, DNAShapefromBEDWindow

    • Constructor Detail

      • DNAShapefromBED

        public DNAShapefromBED(java.io.File gen,
                       java.io.File b,
                       java.lang.String out,
                       boolean[] type,
                       boolean str,
                       java.io.PrintStream[] ps)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize object with script inputs for generating DNA shape reports.
        Parameters:
        gen - the reference genome sequence in FASTA-format (FAI will be automatically generated)
        b - the BED-formatted coordinate intervals to extract sequence from
        out - the output file name base (to add _<shapetype>.cdt suffix to)
        type - a four-element boolean list for specifying shape type to output (no enforcement on size)
        str - force strandedness (true=forced, false=not forced)
        ps - list of four PrintStream objects corresponding to each shape type (for GUI)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Execute script to calculate DNA shape for all types across the input sequence.

        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getAvg

        public double[] getAvg(int shapeType)
        Getter method for average scores of each DNA shape type.
        Parameters:
        shapeType - indicate shape type to return (0=MGW, 1=PropT, 2=HelT, 3=Roll).
        Returns:
        the array of shape scores
